scripts.compile-html: rimraf html && swig render -j vars-html.json src/* -o html
scripts.compile-svg: rimraf svg && swig render -j vars-svg.json src/* -o svg
scripts.compile: npm run compile-html && npm run compile-svg
scripts.bundle: rollup -n hyperappHtml -f umd -i html/index.js -g hyperapp:hyperapp -o html/hyperappHtml.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
